sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: ROLLO Rolf, or Rou, Scandinavian rover, born c. 860, died 932. He made himself independent of Harold of Norway, visited Scotland, England, and Flanders in pirating expeditions, and about 912 established himself
on the Seine and laid the foundation of the duchy of Normandy (see vol. xvii. p. 539).
